title: Man blames cough syrup for stabbing wife 123 times & Child killed when 325-lbs woman sits
itunes:title: Man blames cough syrup for stabbing wife 123 times & Child killed when 325-lbs woman sits
description:
The wanna-be pastor who claims a bad dream induced by a cold medicine overdose caused him to kill his wife allegedly stabbed and slashed his bride 123 times. Nancy Grace looks at the autopsy of Lauren Ashley-Nicole Phelps, including People reporter Steve Helling, crime scene expert Sheryl McCollum, & psychologist Caryn Stark. A Florida woman is charged with killing a 9-year-old by sitting on the little girl. Reporter Drew Nelson joins Grace, Stark and McCollum to discuss.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
